pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, December 6, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a speech in the House of Commons on the anniversary of the 1989 École Polytechnique Montréal tragedy.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Yukon, The Honourable Sandy Silver.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 1:00 p.m.

Montréal, Quebec

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the commemoration honouring the victims of the 1989 École Polytechnique Montréal tragedy.

Belvédère Kondiaronk
Chalet du Mont-Royal
1196, voie Camillien-Houde

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the Chalet du Mont-Royal no later than 3:30 p.m.
